attributes.action: Smoking in a car with anyone under the age of 18 in scotland a criminal offence
attributes.background: As of 1st of October 2015, in England and Wales ONLY it is illegal for anyone to smoke in a car while a person under the age of 18 is present, I am calling for the government to extend this law to scotland. I do not understand why the law should go into force in England and Wales ONLY.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government and the Scottish Parliament are responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
